titleStmt.title: The King's visitatorial power asserted being an impartial relation of the late visitation of St. Mary Magdalen College in Oxford : as likewise an historical account of several visitations of the universities and particular colleges : together with some necessary remarks upon the Kings authority in ecclesiastical causes, according to the laws and usages of this realm / by Nathaniel Johnston ...
titleStmt.author: Johnston, Nathaniel, 1627-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills ... and are sold at his printing-house ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
